title: The Duchess of Malfi and Other Plays
description: John Webster was a radically and creatively experimental dramatist. This volume offers his two great Jacobean tragedies, The White Devil and The Duchess of Malfi , together with his brilliant tragicomedy, The Devil's Law-Case , and the comedy written with William Rowley, A Cure for a Cuckold .The texts of the plays have been newly edited and are presented with modernized spelling and punctuation.
author: John      Webster
